header.text: Note many of these are OLD, and/or useless. Originally meant for development team use only, some may be useful to admins out there.

ESCRIPT.list: prints your armor coverage to the screen.
sends connection statuses of all clients to you
sends reputation system data for a targetted char
sends serial and graphic data for a targetted obj
sends status of world item integrity
sends status of world character integrity
sends status of current zone's item integrity
sends list of critical scripts
sends list of scripts ran or running
prints script profile to pol.log
prints script profile to pol.log and clears counters
prints orphaned object data
prints process data
prints cprop info for targetted obj
sends nearby characters to your client
shuts down the server
begins logging packet data send to and from your client. If priv "plogany" is enabled target cursor for Char selection.
stops packet logging. log file in /pol/log/[account name].log
prints thread info
turns the privilege on or off
